entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -11.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -13.0°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
